name: MARK/DOWN
description:
this a simple ps1 style puzzle game, where you can travel between past and future, and activate elements using energy revolver

controls:

  • move - WASD
  • jump - space
  • pick up objects - E
  • time travel - Q
  • restart level - R
  • shoot - LMB
  • go to main menu - P

made with Railos (Andrey Kirieshki, coder) and MODULAN (music and some models)
